mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into TB_LOG (id, actorid, actinfo, inserttime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update TB_LOG
actorid = #{actorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actinfo = #{actinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inserttime = #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
